attributes.action: matt hancock to resigned as Secretary of State for Health
attributes.additional_details: Due to his constant lying and Refusal of answering media questions that concerns the welfare of the citizens of the United kingdom
attributes.background: Due to the incompetence of matt hancock not portraying the position befitting that ,of health secretary of state to the United kingdom

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
